result.eng: But if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ga: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht
result.orig: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireacht
result.html: Ach má tá tú ag iarraidh geansaí le cochall a cheannacht le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánach an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireachtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.
result.ponchtml: Aċ má tá tú ag iarraiḋ geansaí le coċall a ċeannaċt le rud eicínt scríofa i nGaeilge air is é An Spailpín Fánaċ an áit is fearr le dul ag siopadóireaċtBut if you are attempting to buy a pullover with a hood with something written in Irish on it, An Spailpín Fánach is the best place to go shopping.

result.eng: Apart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
result.ga: Díomaite de chorrbhlag fánach is beag nuashonrú a dhéantar ar fhormhór na suíomhanna

result.ponchtml: Díomaite de ċorrḃlag fánaċ is beag nuaẛonrú a ḋéantar ar ḟorṁór na suíoṁannaApart from the odd blog here and there, most of the sites are only rarely updated.
